com.tigertext.ttandroid.account

Class TigerTextAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.account.TigerTextAccountManager

  • public class TigerTextAccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages user accounts.

      • login

        public void login(@NonNull
                  java.lang.String username,
                  @NonNull
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String pushRoutingId,
                  @NonNull
                  LoginListener listener)
        Logs in a user, then create an Account for them if it doesn't already exists. Otherwise, update that user's account with new metadata.
        Parameters:
        username - Username
        password - Password
        pushRoutingId - Unique ID for routing push notifications
        listener - Callback listener

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn(android.accounts.Account account)
        Parameters:
        account - Account to check
        Returns:
        true if the given Account has valid auth token and is active, false otherwise

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - Name associated with an account to check
        Returns:
        true if the given username is associated with an Account that has valid auth token and is active, false otherwise

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Returns:
        true if there is an active account and its auth token is valid.

      • resetPassword

        public void resetPassword(@NonNull
                          java.lang.String user,
                          @NonNull
                          ResetPasswordListener listener)
        Sends a email, if the user provided is an email address, or sends a text message, if the user provided is a phone number, with instructions indicating on how to reset the users password.
        Parameters:
        user - the email or phone number associated with the account in which instructions should be sent.
        listener - the callback to indicate success or failure
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if == null or empty

      • setPresenceStatus

        public void setPresenceStatus(boolean isOnline)
        This method set and persist the status of the user in shared preferences. This should be set by clients to correctly tell the server about the online status of the user. SSEManager uses this set value only.
        Parameters:
        isOnline -

      • notifyRegistrationAttempt

        public void notifyRegistrationAttempt(GenericAPICallStatusListener genericAPICallStatusListener,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Notifies the server that this is attempting registration. This should be used when a user attempts registration by entering in an email which does not have an account already.

        The purpose of this method is to allow Tigertext to collect data on number of successful registrations.

        Parameters:
        genericAPICallStatusListener -
        emailAddress -
